design_philosophy.visual_style: Dark Glassmorphism with High-Contrast Amber Accents

buttons.primary: bg-[#FFB800] text-black hover:bg-[#E6A600] font-semibold rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,184,0,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 text-white border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-white/20 rounded-full px-8 py-3 backdrop-blur-md transition-all duration-300

cards.glass: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:border-[#FFB800]/30 transition-all duration-500 group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border-white/10 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 focus:border-[#FFB800]/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#FFB800]/50 rounded-xl h-12

navigation.wrapper: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 border-b border-white/5 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-2xl supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-black/20

animations.parallax: Use useScroll and useTransform from framer-motion for vertical parallax on images and text.

motion.scroll: Implement Lenis for smooth scrolling in the root layout.

logo.instructions: Place in top-left of navigation. Ensure height is sufficient (h-10 or h-12) to be legible.

assets.icons: Use lucide-react. NO AI/Robot/Star icons. Use abstract geometric shapes or subject-specific icons (e.g., Beaker for Science, Palette for Arts).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run `yarn add framer-motion lenis @react-three/fiber @react-three/drei` immediately.
2. THEME: Force Dark Mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless requested. The brand is 'Illuminated Wisdom' (Light in Darkness).
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to `index.css` immediately.
4. HERO: Build a Hero section with the 'hero_bg' image as a subtle parallax background. Overlay 'shine waves' using Framer Motion or a custom Canvas.
5. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the defined `glass` utility classes for all cards (Subjects, Articles, Profile).
6. LOGO: Use the provided URL. It has a yellow oval; ensure it sits on a dark background for contrast.
7. NO GENERIC ICONS: Avoid 'robot', 'brain', 'sparkles' icons. Use 'book-open', 'atom', 'feather', 'calculator' from Lucide.
8. TESTING: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic gradients, centered text everywhere).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical (p-8, p-12).
Every interaction must have a micro-animation (hover, focus, active).
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #050505 or #0A0A0A.
Ensure text contrast meets APCA standards (Yellow on Black is great, Grey on Black needs care).
